summary: CONSUMER STATED WHILE DRIVING AND WITHOUT WARNING THE FUEL TANK CRACKED AND CAUSED FUEL TO LEAK. DEALER NOTIFIED.  *NLM  THERE WAS A LEAKAGE, IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE TANK COLLAPSED.  AT THE TIME THE DRIVER HEARD A LOUD NOISE.  THE CONSUMER HAD THE TANK REPAIRED BECAUSE GMC HAS NOT BEEN ABLE TO FURNISH A NEW VEHICLE.  SCC
